definition: Huli district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Huli district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian

sentences.english: Thanks to the cracks, the fish in the lake don't die from the lack of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 也多亏了裂缝，湖里的鱼才不会缺氧致死。

sentences.english: The ball is sealed with a zipper and floats in a pool or a lake.
sentences.chinese: 这个球用一个拉链封口，漂浮在池子或湖里。

sentences.english: More than just black bass lurk in these lakes. Also, there is a lake in which BARRAMUNDI inhabits .
sentences.chinese: 在湖里不仅潜藏著黑巴斯鱼，还有澳洲肺鱼哦。

sentences.english: Some factories send dirty water into lakes and rivers.
sentences.chinese: 一些工厂把脏水排到了湖里和河里。

sentences.english: And death and hell were cast into the lake of fire.
sentences.chinese: 死亡和阴间也被扔在火湖里。

sentences.english: He was grappling with an alligator in a lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 他正在环礁湖里与一只短吻鳄搏斗。

sentences.english: This lake has been fished out, let's try the river.
sentences.chinese: 这湖里的鱼都给捕光了，我们去河里试一试。

sentences.english: They are only found in one of three lakes in Terokkar forest.
sentences.chinese: 狂暴龙虾只有在泰罗卡森林的三个湖里可以钓到。

sentences.english: He threw the huge bass into the black water.
sentences.chinese: 他把那条大巴斯鱼扔进湖里。

sentences.english: Company is located in Tianfeng machinery area, Huli District, Xiamen City, Fujian, China.
sentences.chinese: 公司位于中国福建厦门市湖里区天丰机械城。

sentences.english: Until they stood in a great stone room where lay a black and ancient lake.
sentences.chinese: 直到他们站到躺在黑色的古老的湖里的石室里。

sentences.english: My fishing pole falls in the lake.
The hero has saved the horse and its rider that fell into the lake.
sentences.chinese: 那个英雄已经把掉到湖里去的人和马都救上来了。

sentences.english: Embedding a shadow in my heart.
He cast his line into the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的钓鱼线抛进湖里。

sentences.english: Couple enjoying beer in lagoon, Blue Lagoon cruise, Nanuya Lailai Island.
sentences.chinese: 纳努亚莱莱岛畔，在蓝湖里享用啤酒的情侣。

definition: Hunei township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
